com.bignerdranch.expandablerecyclerview.ViewHolder

Class ParentViewHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • RecyclerView.ViewHolder
      • com.bignerdranch.expandablerecyclerview.ViewHolder.ParentViewHolder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnClickListener

    public class ParentViewHolder
extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener
    ViewHolder for a ParentListItem Keeps track of expanded state and holds callbacks which can be used to trigger expansion-based events.
    Since:
    5/27/2015

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ParentViewHolder.ParentListItemExpandCollapseListener
      Empowers ExpandableRecyclerAdapter implementations to be notified of expand/collapse state change events.

    • Method Detail

      • setMainItemClickToExpand

        public void setMainItemClickToExpand()
        Sets a View.OnClickListener on the entire parent view to trigger expansion.

      • isExpanded

        public boolean isExpanded()
        Returns expanded state for the ParentListItem corresponding to this ParentViewHolder.
        Returns:
        true if expanded, false if not

      • setExpanded

        public void setExpanded(boolean expanded)
        Setter method for expanded state, used for initialization of expanded state. changes to the state are given in onExpansionToggled(boolean)
        Parameters:
        expanded - true if expanded, false if not

      • onExpansionToggled

        public void onExpansionToggled(boolean expanded)
        Callback triggered when expansion state is changed, but not during initialization.

        Useful for implementing animations on expansion.

        Parameters:
        expanded - true if view is expanded before expansion is toggled, false if not

      • getParentListItemExpandCollapseListener

        public ParentViewHolder.ParentListItemExpandCollapseListener getParentListItemExpandCollapseListener()
        Getter for the ParentViewHolder.ParentListItemExpandCollapseListener implemented in ExpandableRecyclerAdapter.
        Returns:
        The ParentViewHolder.ParentListItemExpandCollapseListener set in the ParentViewHolder

      • setParentListItemExpandCollapseListener

        public void setParentListItemExpandCollapseListener(ParentViewHolder.ParentListItemExpandCollapseListener parentListItemExpandCollapseListener)
        Setter for the ParentViewHolder.ParentListItemExpandCollapseListener implemented in ExpandableRecyclerAdapter.
        Parameters:
        parentListItemExpandCollapseListener - The ParentViewHolder.ParentListItemExpandCollapseListener to set on the ParentViewHolder

      • onClick

        public void onClick(android.view.View v)
        View.OnClickListener to listen for click events on the entire parent View.

        Only registered if shouldItemViewClickToggleExpansion() is true.

        Specified by:
        onClick in interface android.view.View.OnClickListener
        Parameters:
        v - The View that is the trigger for expansion

      • shouldItemViewClickToggleExpansion

        public boolean shouldItemViewClickToggleExpansion()
        Used to determine whether a click in the entire parent View should trigger row expansion.

        If you return false, you can call expandView() to trigger an expansion in response to a another event or collapseView() to trigger a collapse.

        Returns:
        true to set an View.OnClickListener on the item view

      • expandView

        protected void expandView()
        Triggers expansion of the parent.

      • collapseView

        protected void collapseView()
        Triggers collapse of the parent.
